question: Have you issued a Special Identity Card of Homegrown Identity (SID) before?
options: I lost it and want to reissue it

question: Are you a permanent and legal resident of Greece or do you have an appropriate visa from a Greek Consular Authority?
Which of the following categories do you belong to?
options: Homogenous person with Albanian nationality residing in Greece
Alien spouse of a homogenous person (regardless of nationality), legally residing in Greece
Alien minor child (irrespective of nationality) whose parental care is held by alien spouses of the homogeneous persons by a previous marriage
Widowed foreigner spouse of a foreigner (of Albanian nationality) legally residing in Greece
I do not belong to any of the above categories

question: Do you have a valid passport or other equivalent travel document issued by the Albanian authorities?
options: Yes, I have an official document confirming it
No, I have no such document
